ComicInfo.Title: The Collector City Club Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue introduces the other members of our main characters comic book club. See what happens when a group of comic book geeks organizes regular meetings to discuss, debate, and dissect all things comics. When this particular meeting goes horribly awry when the group doesn't like Allen's latest, most controversial, idea for the group, they choose to use a heretofore previously unused by-law allowing them to impeach Allen as acting chairman! Allen, stunned by their treachery, quits the club. ALl of this and more in Part 1 of "Collectors City Club"!
